scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin news.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/news.html && usemin interviews.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/interviews.html && usemin allPage.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/allPage.html && usemin blogPage.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/blogPage.html && usemin podcast.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/podcast.html && usemin blogContent.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/blogContent.html
